presentation.name: Bruno Tatsuya
presentation.description: Architecting reliable systems that scale and deliver <underline>real impact</underline>.

about.title: Hello there
about.description: Hi, I'm Bruno! I'm a software developer and computer scientist with 6 years of experience, based in France. Also an enthusiast in automation. Currently working as a Software Engineer at Qonto, I believe technology should be used to make people's lives easier.
